mapper.select: /* selectCertificateListKo */ SELECT A.CERTIFICATE_TITLE_KO AS CERTIFICATE_TITLE , (SELECT FILE_USER_NM FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.CERTIFICATE_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'thumb') AS FILE_USER_NM_THUMB , (SELECT FILE_PATH FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.CERTIFICATE_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'thumb') AS FILE_PATH_THUMB , (SELECT FILE_USER_NM FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.CERTIFICATE_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_USER_NM_MAIN , (SELECT FILE_PATH FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.CERTIFICATE_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_PATH_MAIN FROM TB_CERTIFICATE A WHERE A.USE_STATE = 'Y' ORDER BY A.CERTIFICATE_SORT ASC
